title: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PC are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: Currently, there is no user interface available to define the default line delimiters for new files in the preferences of the application. This can cause compatibility issues when developing a Unix product/program on Windows workstations that are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse.
EB: A user interface should be added to the preferences to allow users to define the default line delimiters for new files. This will ensure that the correct line delimiters are used when developing a Unix product/program on Windows workstations that are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse.
SR: Investigate the possibility of adding a settings option in the preferences menu to allow users to define the default line delimiters for new files. This will provide a solution to the compatibility issues faced when developing a Unix product/program on Windows workstations that are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse.
